__e: You need things to be soft, sensitive and above all, new.
Some of the songs are soft and slow, and there's always a guy who didn't bring a date... and wants to dance with your girl-- guys who don't take no for an answer.
I could tell by your hands, all clean and soft and that.
If your hands are so important, then you'd better protect those weak, girly hands of yours with your life!
They are sweet girls, though I say it myself.
Anyone ever told you, you've got really soft cheeks like a baby's bottom?
